Articles.Content: I have a modded install with Galaxies Unbound and Outer planets, along with some part mods and the typical graphics mods.  However during my playthrough in career I cant seem to find asteroid in the tracking station (fully upgraded).  I put up a Sentinel equipped satellite in a lower solar orbit then Kerbin and yet no ? are showing on the map.  I though it was my game at first, that a mod broke it, but I fired up a Sandbox mode and they are appearing.  Any Ideas what it could be?  Am I doing something wrong to make them show up?

This has to do with Kopernicus.

Go to the Kopernicus folder, open the 'config' folder and the Kopernicus_config.cfg.
Check if "UseKopernicusAsteroidSystem" is set to to "Stock" (and not "true").

This will probably solve your issue for OPM. Not really sure for GU though...

10 hours ago, modus said:

This has to do with Kopernicus.

Go to the Kopernicus folder, open the 'config' folder and the Kopernicus_config.cfg.
Check if "UseKopernicusAsteroidSystem" is set to to "Stock" (and not "true").

This will probably solve your issue for OPM. Not really sure for GU though...

Is there a reason the asteroids show up in Sandbox and not Career though?  That's what's weird to me.
